snippet.title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles - Tsuzumi Mansion Story Gameplay | PS5, PS4
snippet.description:
Become the blade that destroys demons!

Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles is a video game based on the anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, releasing on PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5 and more on October 15!

Take up the sword as Tanjiro Kamado, a Demon Slayer who is on a journey to avenge his murdered family and restore his sister Nezuko—who was transformed into a demon—back to human form, and defeat the demons that threaten humanity!

Title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles
Genre: Demon-slaying Action
Platform: PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5 and more
Release: 10/15/2021
Development: CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.
Production: Aniplex Inc.
Publisher: SEGA

©Koyoharu Gotoge / SHUEISHA, Aniplex, ufotable
©DEMON SLAYER KIMETSU NO YAIBA THE HINOKAMI CHRONICLES COMMITTEE
Published by SEGA. SEGA and the SEGA logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA CORPORATION.
